definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Of the use of advanced ultrasonic humidification humidification system.
sentences.chinese: 加溼系統採用先進的超聲波加溼。

sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.
sentences.chinese: 軸採用滾珠螺桿傳動精度佳，摩擦係數小。

sentences.english: To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解決措施爲採用氬弧焊，改進焊接結構設計等。

sentences.english: Performance of coating plate with the special hydrophobic coating solution was better.
sentences.chinese: 採用雙疏塗層溶液塗覆的多孔板相對好一些。

sentences.english: The semi-duplex work form was adopted between suspending gap sensor and control…
sentences.chinese: 而懸浮間隙傳感器和控制器間則採用半雙工方式工作。

sentences.english: The peeled eggs are completely natural and provide customers with convenience and ease of use.
sentences.chinese: 白煮採用提桶或真空包裝，給用戶提供方便和快捷。

sentences.english: So the personality theory's got to go.
sentences.chinese: 所以不該採用人格理論了。

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本機採用微機電腦控制，步進電機拖料。

sentences.english: The nanocrystalline TiO2 film is sensitized by dyestuff with dip and absorption.
sentences.chinese: 採用浸漬吸附法對納米晶二氧化鈦薄膜進行染料敏化。

sentences.english: By use of stagger arrangement, the detector array has 100% fill-factor.
sentences.chinese: 器件採用品字形排列，佔空比爲100%。

sentences.english: Installed with proportional deviation display thermostat, to control temperature accurately.
sentences.chinese: 採用比例式偏差指示溫控器，可精確控制溫度。

sentences.english: The heat source for evaporation may be Iow pressure steam or surplus heat steam.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發操作的熱源可採用低壓蒸汽或廢熱蒸汽。

sentences.english: By means of the method, a full-scale test pile in Zhenjiang Port has been analysed.
sentences.chinese: 對鎮江大港原型試樁採用上述方法進行了分析。

sentences.english: Using low pass filters before the readout device may also reduce bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 在讀出設備之前採用低通濾波器也可以減小帶寬。
磁選機採用開放型磁系。

sentences.english: In the computation of wave diffraction, thin layer of water is employed to simulate the breakwater.
sentences.chinese: 在計算堤後繞射中，採用了堤上薄膜水的方法。

definition: to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
look/external appearance/design/overall brand look or logo that can be patented
to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
